title: Procurement of Chemical Fertilizer for the Government Fertilizer Companies for the year 2011
decision_details:
- the proposal made by Hon. S.M. Chandrasena, Minister of Agrarian Services and Wildlife, for the procurement of the following quantities of fertilizer for the Government Fertilizer Companies for the year 2011, was approved by the Cabinet: 

*	2400 MT of Urea for Ceylon Fertilizer Co. Limited and 12000 MT of Urea for Commercial Fertilizer Co. Limited to be supplied in July 2011. 

*	2400 MT of Triple Super Phosphate for Ceylon Fertilizer Co. Limited and 12000 MT of Triple Super Phosphate for Commercial Fertilizer Co. Limited to be supplied in July 2011. 

*	12000 MT of Murate of Potash for Ceylon Fertilizer Co. Limited and 12000 MT of Murate of Potash for Commercial Fertilizer Co. Limited to be supplied in July 2011.
